name: Leveraging Internal Sabotage
description: Using defectors to weaken the PSN structure from within before extraction.

cards.title: Planting False Narratives
cards.description: Using defectors to spread misinformation and create internal fractures.
bulletpoints: PSN networks rely on trust; false narratives erode their cohesion.
Encouraging defectors to plant doubt about leadership decisions creates instability.
The goal is to make the PSN implode before direct intervention is required.

cards.title: Weaponizing Paranoia
cards.description: Using a defectorâ€™s inside knowledge to increase distrust among PSN members.
bulletpoints: Encourage defectors to expose minor internal betrayals that fuel larger paranoia.
When PSN members believe there are traitors among them, infighting increases.
A fractured PSN is easier to dismantle than a unified one.

cards.title: Strategic Extraction Timing
cards.description: Knowing when and how to remove a defector without raising suspicion.
bulletpoints: A sudden defection raises alarms, but a slow withdrawal reduces backlash.
Allow defectors to phase out by creating plausible reasons for their departure.
Simultaneously executing multiple defections further disorients the PSN.
